api_key.label: wordnik api-key
api_key.tooltip: get your api key at http://developer.wordnik.com/

get_api_key.label: get wordnik api key
get_api_key.tooltip: opens a webpage to get the api key

use_file.label: use textfile for random words
use_file.tooltip: if you want to provide a list of words to choose random words from, enable this

file_name.label: random words file name
file_name.tooltip: the file needs to be placed inside the hangman script folds (right click to open folder)

open_folder.label: open script folder
open_folder.tooltip: here you have to add the words file if you selected 'use textfile for random words'

use_different_guess_command.label: different guess commands
use_different_guess_command.tooltip: use different commands for guess & guess word?

start_game_info.label: start game permission info
start_game_info.tooltip: extra info, eg: 10 (for Min_Hours) or: Rank1 (for Min_Rank)

min_word_length.label: min word length
min_word_length.tooltip: how long should a random word at least be

max_word_length.label: max word length
max_word_length.tooltip: how long should a random word maximum be

send_message_if_not_enough_points.label: send warning
send_message_if_not_enough_points.tooltip: send message if not enough currency points

send_progress_after_guess.label: send progress
send_progress_after_guess.tooltip: send progress after each guess (disable when you want to show it on stream)

auto_start_game.label: auto start games
auto_start_game.tooltip: automatically start a new game after a delay after last game finished

auto_delay.label: delay (seconds) before starting
auto_delay.tooltip: time before starting a new after previous one finished

only_online.label: only auto start when online
only_online.tooltip: should the streamer be online to automatically be start games

end_after_x_turns.label: and after x turns?
end_after_x_turns.tooltip: should the amount of guesses be limited or not?

nb_turns.label: max_nb_turns
nb_turns.tooltip: what is the maximum amount of guesses when they are limited

word_guess_counts_as_turn.label: word guesses count as turns
word_guess_counts_as_turn.tooltip: false if word guesses are always allowed as long as turns are not up

use_multiplier.label: award per occurrence
use_multiplier.tooltip: multiply the award with the amount of occurrences

guess_cost.label: guess letter cost
guess_cost.tooltip: Cost for guessing a letter that is not a vowel

guess_vowel_cost.label: guess vowel cost
guess_vowel_cost.tooltip: Cost for guessing a letter that is a vowel

find_letter_reward.label: find letter reward
find_letter_reward.tooltip: this is not rewarded when the letter completes the word

finish_word_reward.label: find or finish word reward
finish_word_reward.tooltip: rewarded to user who guesses or completes the word

guess_command.label: guess command
guess_command.tooltip: guess letter (and word if not using 2 commands)

guess_word_command.label: guess word command
guess_word_command.tooltip: only used when 'different guess commands' is enabled

in_progress_response.value: current game is still in progress
in_progress_response.label: in progress
in_progress_response.tooltip: shown when a new game start is attempted while one is still running

start_response.value: a game of hangman has been started, start guessing now using {0} (letter)
start_response.label: start
start_response.tooltip:
shown when a game is started
{0} : the guess command

guess_word_addition.label: guess word addition
guess_word_addition.tooltip:
added to start_response when using guessWord
{0} : the guessWord command

turn_limit_response.value: the word has not been found within the turn limit, the solution was {0}
turn_limit_response.label: turn limit reached
turn_limit_response.tooltip:
shown when max turns reached
{0} : the (not found) solution

wrong_word_guess_response.value: {0}, the word {1} is incorrect, better luck next time
wrong_word_guess_response.label: wrong word guess
wrong_word_guess_response.tooltip:
shown when a word guess has been made and was wrong
{0} : username
{1} : guessed word

not_enough_points_response.value: {0}, you don't have enough {1}, you need {2} and only have {3}
not_enough_points_response.label: not enough points
not_enough_points_response.tooltip:
shown when user doesn't have enough points to guess on attempt
{0} : username
{1} : currency name
{2} : needed points
{3} current points

no_game_running_response.value: {0}, there is currently no hangman game running, pls start one using {1}
no_game_running_response.label: no game running
no_game_running_response.tooltip:
shown when guess is made but no game is running
{0} : username
{1} : start command

last_letter_found_response.value: {0} found the last letter {1} of the word {2} and has been rewarded {3} {4} for finishing the word.
last_letter_found_response.label: last letter found
last_letter_found_response.tooltip:
word found by finding last letter
{0} : username
{1} : letter
{2} : solution
{3} : rewarded amount
{4} currency name

found_letter_response.label: letter found
found_letter_response.tooltip:
shown when a letter (that is not the last one) is found
{0} : username
{1} : found letter
{2} : rewarded points
{3} : currency name

letter_not_in_word_response.value: {0}, {1} is not in the word, cost: {2}, {3}
letter_not_in_word_response.label: letter not in word
letter_not_in_word_response.tooltip:
shown when a wrong letter has been guessed
{0} : username
{1} : guessed letter
{2} : cost points
{3} : currency name

found_correct_word_response.value: {0} has found the correct word {1} and has been rewarded {2} {3}.
found_correct_word_response.label: found correct word
found_correct_word_response.tooltip:
shown when a wordguess finds the word
{0} : username
{1} : found word
{2} : rewarded points
{3} : currency name

progress_response.label: progression
progress_response.tooltip:
shown after every guess, if enabled
{0} : progression

max_turns_prefix.label: max turns progression prefix
max_turns_prefix.tooltip:
shown when end_after_x_turns enabled, shown before progression
{0} current turn
{1} max turns

vanish_delay.label: vanish delay (seconds)
vanish_delay.tooltip: delay after end of game before overlay vanishes

hangman_color.label: hangman color
hangman_color.tooltip: the color of the hangman that gets drawn in the overlay

overlay_button.label: open overlay folder
overlay_button.tooltip: opens overlay folder to add overlay to (SL)OBS

allow_chat_message.label: allow random word start in chat
allow_chat_message.tooltip: because youtube does not support whispers

next_word.label: word for next game
next_word.tooltip: leave this empty for a random word

button_start.label: Start game (save settings beforehand)
button_start.tooltip: does the same as whispering '!startHangman' to chatbot
